Description: Available 9/1/23 (or Sooner! Massive 6 bed 3.5 Bath on Hopedale Street in Alston! **PLEASE NO UNDERGRADS** Kitchen is fairly modern with updated appliances and is complimented by a large eat in dining area! Bathrooms are all recently renovated and have updated vanities. Unit has central AC and heating Laundry in unit Seasonal porch and a back patio for your enjoyment Please call with any questions!
